Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Amberton Lane, between the elven shrine and the Bushman Estate.
Room.LongDescription: The Bushman Estate grows nearly every variety of fruit, vegetable and just about anything else you can think of. Their large farmland estate runs west from Amberton Lane all the way to Lankshire Parkway. Fresh fruits and vegetables are often for sale on the corners around their farmlands.
